name: David The Diver
description:
Note:Game takes <1minute to load on browser after dive in is pressed

Explore the sea on this open water adventure. Through out the ocean you will encounter all sorts of creatures that will interact with you in unique ways. Learn to read the current and you will master the sea.

Controls

WASD - Move

Hold Shift - Speed Up

Left Click - Stab

Q - Tentacle Skill 1

E - Tentacle Skill 2

Hold Q/E + mouse scroll - swap skill 

Credit

RadicalPi - 3d Models

Simba - Concept art + 2d art

MarlboroMan - Sound

Epic King Salt - Story

Clever Raven - Animations + 3d Models

BigBoss - Scripting

Autumn - Scripting + Shaders
